name: reelgood
description: ReelGood is a web application for movie enthusiasts that provides users with the ability to browse info on the latest movies, manage a favorites list and find a nearby theater to visit in order to see whatâ€™s now playing. It can be viewed on Heroku [here](https://reelgood.herokuapp.com/).

scripts.start: cd backend && node app.js && cd .. & cd frontend && npm start
scripts.build: cd backend && npm install && cd .. && cd frontend && npm install
